feed.title: Could This Be Any Moreâ€¦?
feed.subtitle: "Could This Be Any More...?" is a podcast featuring Aaron and Erica Bushnell. They topically discuss this rhetorical question with their past experiences, awful jokes and banter.

entry.title: 8-bit

entry.title: Humid
entry.content: Aaron and Erica talk about summer-y things like favorite foods, vacation spots and what kept them busy when school was out. Also some unfortunate movie and baby product reviews. ğŸ’© ğŸ¼

entry.title: Awkward
entry.content: The first episode! Aaron and Erica play with fidget spinners, introduce a new member of the family and share their awkward stories. Thereâ€™s farting dogs, running into parked cars and thatâ€™s only a portion of the awkwardness.
